overview:
## Discussion

The frame interpolator uses this property to overlay your custom UI on any frame data it produces into [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/outputTexture].

Use property [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/isUITextureComposited] to indicate to this frame interpolator if this texture contains a precomposition of [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTexture]and UI.

# uiTexture

**Instance Property**

An optional texture containing your game’s custom UI that this frame interpolator evaluates.

## Declaration

```swift
var uiTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The frame interpolator uses this property to overlay your custom UI on any frame data it produces into [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/outputTexture].

Use property [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/isUITextureComposited] to indicate to this frame interpolator if this texture contains a precomposition of [doc://com.apple.metalfx/documentation/MetalFX/MTLFXFrameInterpolatorBase/colorTexture]and UI.
title: uiTexture
